author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Heat the butter in a small saucepan and sauté the leeks for 3-4 minutes, or until soft. Add the cayenne pepper and double cream and simmer for 3-4 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and spoon into a small ovenproof dish. Sprinkle over the grated cheese, then transfer to the oven and bake for five minutes, or until the cheese is melted and golden. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 tbsp butter,  ½ leek, finely sliced,  ¼ tsp cayenne pepper,  5 tbsp double cream,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  100g/3½oz cheddar, grated
